hadiths.text: Narrated One of the Companion: Al-Qasim, the client of AbdurRahman, quoted one of the Companion of the Prophet (ﷺ) as saying: We would eat a camel on an expedition without dividing it, and when we returned to our dwellings our saddle-bags would be full with its flesh

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي حَمْلِ الطَّعَامِ مِنْ أَرْضِ الْعَدُوِّ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Carrying Food Out Of The Land Of The Enemy
